solution_line_template: For each {performance_minutes} minutes she performs, Carlotta spends {performance_minutes} * {practice_per_minute} minutes = <<{performance_minutes}*{practice_per_minute}={practice_minutes}>>{practice_minutes} minutes practicing.

For each {performance_minutes} minutes she performs, Carlotta throws tantrums for {performance_minutes} * {tantrum_per_minute} minutes = <<{performance_minutes}*{tantrum_per_minute}={tantrum_minutes}>>{tantrum_minutes} minutes.

Thus, in total, for each {performance_minutes} minutes of performance time, she spends {practice_minutes} minutes + {tantrum_minutes} minutes + {performance_minutes} minutes = {total_minutes} minutes on all three activities.
